text: @Liz_Wheeler @GavinNewsom In 2 weeks, there will be another COVID19 surge & many of these people will die...they didn't have to but they just couldn't control themselves. COVID19 doesn't care if you mistakenly think your rights are being violated. It's ready & waiting to infect all of the protesters.
